summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to historic preservation; authorizing the purchase by the City of development rights from the owner of the Eagles Building, a Seattle Landmark to be restored as a performing arts theater and low-income housing; authorizing additional City funding for the rehabilitation of the Eagles Building in return for public benefits; making appropriations from the Development Rights Fund and general fund; authorizing related agreements and acceptance of deeds; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote.
